#summary OSX Installation Notes

= Introduction =

Installation notes for OSX


= Details =

File /etc/apache2/users/USERNAME.conf

{{{
<Directory "/Users/USERNAME/Sites/">
    Options Indexes FollowSymlinks MultiViews
    AllowOverride All
    Order allow,deny
    Allow from all
</Directory>

<Directory "/Users/USERNAME/Sites/cgi-bin/">
    Options ExecCGI FollowSymLinks
    SetHandler cgi-script
</Directory>

AccessFileName .htaccess
}}}

File /Users/USERNAME/Sites/.htaccess

{{{
RewriteEngine  On
RewriteBase    /~USERNAME
RewriteRule    ^mine(.*)      cgi-bin/protomine.cgi$1
}}}
